sentences.english: It was Soapy's design to assume the role of a "masher" ⑷.
sentences.chinese: 索比的打算是扮演一个色狼。

sentences.english: Her boss is really a lady-killer .
sentences.chinese: 她的老板确实是个色狼。

sentences.english: He's the biggest wolf in school.
sentences.chinese: 他是学校里的头号大色狼。

sentences.english: Poor clever boy besides it is a big big eater, still be a big Lothario .
sentences.chinese: 瘦猴除了是个大饭桶，还是个大色狼。

sentences.english: You say I am a satyr, never would I have a feeling.
sentences.chinese: 你就说我是色狼，永远都不会对我有感觉。

sentences.english: When I see the color wolf, I will cut him hand.
sentences.chinese: 当我见到色狼，我会砍了他的手。

sentences.english: He was arrested because he was a big wolf.
sentences.chinese: 他被捕了，因为他是个大色狼。

sentences.english: What kind of beautymakes you a lady-killer?
sentences.chinese: 什么样子的美女让你成为一个色狼？

sentences.english: A stich in time saves crime.
sentences.chinese: 及时缝一针，免得遇色狼。

sentences.english: Jean: What if some pervert takes advantage of the machine?
sentences.chinese: 要是某个变态色狼利用这个机器怎么办？

definition: sex fiend/molester/sex attacker/sex demon (a spirit that enters people's souls and makes them desire sex)
pervert (esp. one who gropes women in public)
to take advantage of sb/to freeload
queer uncle, referring to a young to middle-aged male pedophile (Internet slang)
